programme.desc: Megumin proposes that everyone go to the hot springs to heal Kazuma's previous injuries. They group sets off along with Wiz.

programme.title: Under the Fig Trees
programme.desc: Fig pickers – young and old, men and women - flirt, conspire and exchange snatches of gossip while toiling in the gorgeous Tunisian sunlight.

programme.title: Brother's Keeper
programme.desc: Yusuf’s best friend, Memo falls gravely ill. Isolated in their boarding school located in the snowy mountains, tensions run high as Yusuf’s calls for help for Memo becomes increasingly difficult in the face of an authoritarian and bureaucratic system.

programme.title: Go Youth!
programme.desc: Four teenagers, each with unique dreams, passions, and fears, attempt to navigate through the contemporary adult world of Mexico City. The pursuit of their youthful ideals is met with setbacks along the way as we follow in their journey.

programme.title: Paralympian
programme.desc: Inspired by true stories. The one leg athlete sinks into a deep depression, until one day he is offered to try his luck at the Paralympic games.

programme.title: Another Love
programme.desc: After losing her husband Michi in an accident two years ago, physiotherapist Julika starts a relationship with the easy-going bicycle city guide Konstantin. With Konstantin, life is full of lightness and adventure again, but is it really love?

programme.title: A Tale of Samurai Cooking - A True Love Story
programme.desc: Great cook Haru has married into the legendary “Kitchen Samurai” family. But her husband who is the successor of the Funaki family cannot cook at all. Haru makes a vow to make him a superb samurai chef and starts teaching her new husband how to cook.

programme.title: Goodnight Mommy
programme.desc: In a secluded countryside home, ten-year-old twins grow suspicious when their mother returns from plastic surgery distant and unrecognizable. Isolated from the world, they embark on a quest to find out whether this woman is their mother.

programme.title: Murders in Pont-Aven
programme.desc: The bodies of two gallery owners are found. These murders are reminiscent of the death of Suzanne, a painter, 20 years ago. The investigation is led by Marion, Suzanne's daughter, and by Antoine who was in charge of the investigations at the time.

programme.title: The Lady Diplomat: Fatal Alibi
programme.desc: A young motorcyclist is killed in an accident. Daniel Stokr, an employee of the Czech Ministry of Economy, is accused of being involved. Though Karla takes on the case, she is able to give him an alibi, which sends her on an uncertain trail for the truth.

programme.title: Torch
programme.desc: In a war zone, two sisters, stuck in a basement while waiting for their father, attempt to distract themselves from the desperation of their situation by playing games and recounting old stories.

programme.title: Needle Park Baby
programme.desc: Based on the autobiography by Michelle Halbneer, “Needle Park Baby” recounts the unbelievable story of an eleven-year-old girl and a childhood growing up with heroin addicted parents set in Platzspitzpark, Zurich’s public drug scene in the nineties.

programme.title: Diana's Wedding
programme.desc: Through the eyes of Diana, we witness the rollercoaster ride of both her parent’s and Irene’s marriages. To both girls, they have the worst parents in the world. But at the end of the day, which of the couples remain strong and which fall apart ?

programme.title: Traces of Sandalwood
programme.desc: Adopted and living in Spain for years, a young woman returns to Mumbai to discover her roots, accompanied by a handsome Indian guide whom she romances.

programme.title: The Return
programme.desc: Two Danish-Korean adoptees, Karoline and Thomas, return to their birth country for the first time. The pair meet in Seoul where they encounter fellow adoptees, sparking an emotional journey that challenges their destiny and identity.
